statements: SELECT * FROM experimental_data;
SELECT experiment_id, protocol_name FROM experimental_data ORDER BY experiment_id DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, experiment_date FROM experimental_data WHERE experiment_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM experimental_data WHERE researcher_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT experiment_id, protocol_name, research_findings FROM experimental_data ORDER BY research_findings DESC;
SELECT * FROM experimental_data WHERE researcher_name = 'Alice' ORDER BY experiment_date DESC;
SELECT experiment_id, protocol_name, researcher_name FROM experimental_data WHERE experiment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND research_findings LIKE '%significant%';
SELECT researcher_name, COUNT(*) AS experiment_count FROM experimental_data GROUP BY researcher_name HAVING experiment_count > 1 ORDER BY experiment_count DESC;
SELECT protocol_name, COUNT(*) AS protocol_count FROM experimental_data GROUP BY protocol_name ORDER BY protocol_count ASC;
SELECT * FROM experimental_data WHERE researcher_name IN ('Bob', 'Charlie') AND protocol_name = 'PCR' OR protocol_name = 'ELISA';
SELECT * FROM experimental_protocols;
SELECT protocol_name, researcher_name, start_date, end_date FROM experimental_protocols WHERE start_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT protocol_name, researcher_name FROM experimental_protocols WHERE researcher_name = 'Alice' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT id, finding_description, result FROM research_findings WHERE result > 0.5 ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT id, finding_description, result, timestamp FROM research_findings WHERE finding_description LIKE '%discovery%' ORDER BY result DESC, timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM experimental_protocols WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT protocol_name, researcher_name FROM experimental_protocols ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM experimental_protocols WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM research_findings WHERE result BETWEEN 0.5 AND 1.0;

SELECT protocol_name, COUNT(id) as num_findings FROM experimental_protocols JOIN research_findings ON experimental_protocols.id = research_findings.protocol_id GROUP BY protocol_name HAVING COUNT(id) > 5;
SELECT * FROM experimental_protocols ORDER BY protocol_id DESC;
SELECT protocol_name, protocol_description FROM experimental_protocols WHERE protocol_id = 1;
SELECT finding_id, finding_date, finding_description FROM research_findings WHERE finding_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT protocol_name FROM experimental_protocols WHERE protocol_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM biotechnology_projects ORDER BY project_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM experimental_protocols WHERE protocol_id = 1;
SELECT protocol_name, protocol_description FROM experimental_protocols WHERE protocol_id > 5 ORDER BY protocol_name DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM biotechnology_projects WHERE LENGTH(project_description) > 100;
SELECT * FROM research_findings WHERE finding_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY finding_id ASC;
SELECT protocol_id, COUNT(finding_id) AS num_findings FROM research_findings GROUP BY protocol_id HAVING num_findings > 3 ORDER BY num_findings DESC;
SELECT * FROM experiments;
SELECT experiment_id, start_date FROM experiments WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT protocol_id, protocol_name FROM protocols ORDER BY protocol_name ASC;
SELECT finding_id, experiment_id, result FROM findings WHERE result='positive';
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM projects WHERE project_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM experiments WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT experiment_id, protocol_id, start_date FROM experiments ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT protocol_name, protocol_description FROM protocols WHERE protocol_name LIKE '%experiment%';
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM projects WHERE LENGTH(project_description) > 100;
SELECT * FROM findings WHERE result = 'positive' ORDER BY finding_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM protocol;
SELECT protocol_name, description FROM protocol WHERE protocol_id = 1;
SELECT researcher_name, email FROM researcher WHERE institution = 'University';
SELECT * FROM experimental_design ORDER BY design_id DESC;
SELECT experiment_id, experiment_name, start_date, end_date FROM experiment WHERE researcher_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM protocol WHERE protocol_id = 1;
SELECT protocol_name, description FROM protocol ORDER BY create_date DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, email, institution FROM researcher WHERE institution = 'University';
SELECT experiment_name, start_date, end_date FROM experiment WHERE researcher_id = 3 ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT result_name, observations, data FROM results WHERE experiment_id = 5;
